node.title: Glasgow Coma Scale
node.explanation:
Score  Response
Eye Opening
  4    Opens eyes spontaneously
  3    Opens eyes in response to speech
  2    Opens eyes in response to pain
  1    Does not open eyes in response to pain
Motor response
  6    Follows commands
  5    Localizes pain
  4    Moves to pain but not purposefully
  3    Flexes upper extremities to pain
  2    Extends all extremities to pain
  1    No motor response to pain
Verbal response
  5    Oriented to person, place and time
  4    Confused speech
  3    Replies with inappropriate words
  2    Incomprehensible sounds
  1    No verbal response
